# ğŸ¯ Toh Framework > **"Type Once, Have it all!"** - AI-Orchestration Driven Development [![npm version](https://img.shields.io/npm/v/toh-framework.svg?style=flat-square)](https://www.npmjs.com/package/toh-framework) [![npm downloads](https://img.shields.io/npm/dt/toh-framework.svg?style=flat-square)](https://www.npmjs.com/package/toh-framework) [![License](https://img.shields.io/npm/l/toh-framework.svg?style=flat-square)](https://github.com/wasintoh/toh-framework/blob/main/LICENSE) [![GitHub stars](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/wasintoh/toh-framework?style=flat-square)](https://github.com/wasintoh/toh-framework) ğŸŒ **Official Website:** [tohframework.dev](https://tohframework.dev) > ğŸ“– **[ğŸ‡¹ğŸ‡­ Thai Documentation](docs/README-TH.md)** ## ğŸ¤– Supported IDEs | IDE | Status | Notes | |-----|--------|-------| | ğŸ§  **Claude Code** | âœ… Full Support | Native Sub-Agents, Slash commands | | ğŸ“ **Cursor** | âœ… Full Support | @ file references | | ğŸŒŒ **Google Antigravity** | âœ… Full Support | Gemini integration | | ğŸ’ **Gemini CLI** | âœ… Full Support | Context files auto-loaded | | ğŸ¤– **Codex CLI** | âœ… Supported | OpenAI agents | ## ğŸ’¡ Why Toh? **Toh** = **T**ype **O**nce, **H**ave it all! We believe **Solo Developers** and **Solopreneurs** should be able to build SaaS systems single-handedly without being an expert in every field. Toh Framework enables you to: - ğŸ’¬ **Command in natural language** - No complex prompts needed - ğŸ¤– **AI handles everything** - Breaks down tasks, calls agents, executes until done - ğŸ‘€ **See results instantly** - No waiting, no answering questions - ğŸš€ **Production-ready** - Not just a prototype ## ğŸ†• What's New in v1.6.0 ### ğŸ¤– Claude Code Sub-Agents 7 native sub-agents for Claude Code's Task delegation feature: | Agent | Specialty | |-------|-----------| | ğŸ¨ **ui-builder** | Pages, Components, Layouts | | âš™ï¸ **dev-builder** | Logic, State, API | | ğŸ”Œ **backend-connector** | Supabase, Auth, RLS | | âœ¨ **design-reviewer** | Polish, Animation | | ğŸ§ª **test-runner** | Auto test & fix | | ğŸ§  **plan-orchestrator** | Analyze, Plan | | ğŸ“± **platform-adapter** | LINE, Mobile, Desktop | ### ğŸ”„ Multi-Agent Orchestration **`/toh` v4.0** - The Smart Command with full visibility: ```bash /toh create a coffee shop management system # AI shows you the plan: ğŸ“‹ Workflow Plan: â”œâ”€â”€ 1. plan-orchestrator â†’ Analyze requirements â”œâ”€â”€ 2. ui-builder â†’ Create all pages + components â”œâ”€â”€ 3. dev-builder â†’ Add state + forms + API â”œâ”€â”€ 4. design-reviewer â†’ Polish to professional â””â”€â”€ 5. test-runner â†’ Test until pass ğŸš€ Executing... ``` ### ğŸ¨ Vibe Mode **`/toh-vibe`** - Full project creation as orchestration pattern: ``` /toh-vibe â†’ plan â†’ ui â†’ dev â†’ design â†’ test â†’ âœ… Working App ``` One command, complete application with: - âœ… 5+ pages (Home, Dashboard, Feature, Settings, Auth) - âœ… Full logic and state management - âœ… Realistic mock data - âœ… Professional design with animations - âœ… All tests passing ### ğŸ“¦ Dual Architecture | IDE | Folder | Format | |-----|--------|--------| | Claude Code | `.claude/` | Native (tools, model) | | Others | `.toh/` | Original (type, skills) | Both contain identical capabilities - fully synced on install! ### ğŸ‘ï¸ Full Visibility See exactly which agent does what: ``` ğŸ¤– Agent: ui-builder ğŸ“š Skills: ui-first-builder, design-mastery, premium-experience ğŸ’¾ Memory: Loaded âœ… âœ… Created: src/app/dashboard/page.tsx âœ… Created: src/components/stats-card.tsx ``` --- ## âœ¨ Features | Feature | Description | |---------|-------------| | **`/toh` Smart Command** | Type anything, AI picks the right agent | | **Sub-Agents** | 7 specialized agents for different tasks | | **Multi-Agent Orchestration** | Complex workflows with full visibility | | **Premium Experience** | 5+ pages with animations in one prompt | | **Design Mastery** | 13 business profiles for smart design | | **Auto Memory** | Context persists across sessions and IDEs | | **Auto Testing** | Test & fix loop until all pass | --- ## ğŸ“¦ Installation ```bash # Interactive install (choose IDEs and language) npx toh-framework install # Quick install (Claude Code + Cursor, English) npx toh-framework install --quick # Specific IDE only npx toh-framework install --ide claude npx toh-framework install --ide cursor npx toh-framework install --ide gemini npx toh-framework install --ide codex # Multiple IDEs npx toh-framework install --ide "claude,cursor,gemini,codex" ``` ## ğŸ”„ Update to Latest Version ```bash # Method 1: Use npx (recommended - always gets latest) npx toh-framework@latest install # Method 2: If installed globally npm update -g toh-framework toh install ``` > ğŸ’¡ **Tip:** Reinstalling updates skills, agents, and commands without deleting your existing memory! --- ## ğŸš€ Quick Start ### Claude Code ```bash # Open project with Claude Code claude . # Show all commands /toh-help # Smart command - AI picks the right agent /toh create a landing page with pricing section # Create complete project /toh-vibe coffee shop management system # Add UI /toh-ui Add a dashboard with sales charts # Add Logic /toh-dev Add form validation and API calls # Improve Design /toh-design Make it look professional # Test system /toh-test # Deploy /toh-ship ``` ### Cursor ```bash # Call Toh agent @toh Create a meeting room booking system # Or use specific command @toh:ui Create a calendar page for room booking ``` ### Gemini CLI / Antigravity ```bash # Start Gemini CLI gemini # Use commands /toh-vibe Inventory management system ``` --- ## ğŸ“‹ Available Commands | Command | Shortcut | Description | |---------|----------|-------------| | `/toh` | - | ğŸ§  **Smart Command** - Type anything, AI picks agent | | `/toh-plan` | `/toh-p` | ğŸ“‹ **Plan** - Analyze, plan, orchestrate | | `/toh-vibe` | `/toh-v` | ğŸ¨ **Create Project** - Complete app in one command | | `/toh-ui` | `/toh-u` | ğŸ–¼ï¸ **Create UI** - Pages, Components, Layouts | | `/toh-dev` | `/toh-d` | âš™ï¸ **Add Logic** - TypeScript, Zustand, Forms | | `/toh-design` | `/toh-ds` | âœ¨ **Polish Design** - Professional, not AI-looking | | `/toh-test` | `/toh-t` | ğŸ§ª **Test** - Auto test & fix until pass | | `/toh-connect` | `/toh-c` | ğŸ”Œ **Connect Backend** - Supabase, Auth, RLS | | `/toh-line` | `/toh-l` | ğŸ’š **LINE Mini App** - LIFF integration | | `/toh-mobile` | `/toh-m` | ğŸ“± **Mobile App** - Expo / React Native | | `/toh-fix` | `/toh-f` | ğŸ”§ **Fix Bugs** - Systematic debugging | | `/toh-ship` | `/toh-s` | ğŸš€ **Deploy** - Vercel, Production ready | | `/toh-help` | `/toh-h` | â“ **Help** - Show all commands | --- ## ğŸ—ï¸ Tech Stack (Fixed) No decisions needed - optimized stack ready to go: | Category | Technology | |----------|------------| | Framework | Next.js 14 (App Router) | | Styling | Tailwind CSS + shadcn/ui | | State | Zustand | | Forms | React Hook Form + Zod | | Backend | Supabase | | Testing | Playwright | | Language | TypeScript (strict) | --- ## ğŸ§  Philosophy (AODD) **AI-Orchestration Driven Development:** 1. **Natural Language â†’ Tasks** - Just describe what you want 2. **Orchestrator â†’ Agents** - System calls the right specialists 3. **No Process Management** - You just receive results 4. **Test â†’ Fix â†’ Loop** - Auto-fix until everything passes ``` User: "Create a coffee shop management system" Orchestrator: â”œâ”€â”€ ğŸ“ plan-orchestrator â†’ Analyze & plan â”œâ”€â”€ ğŸ¨ ui-builder â†’ Create all UI â”œâ”€â”€ âš™ï¸ dev-builder â†’ Add logic â”œâ”€â”€ âœ¨ design-reviewer â†’ Polish design â”œâ”€â”€ ğŸ§ª test-runner â†’ Test & fix â””â”€â”€ âœ… Deliver working system! ``` --- ## ğŸ“– Examples ### Create E-commerce ``` /toh-vibe Online store with products, cart, and checkout ``` ### Create Dashboard ``` /toh-vibe Analytics dashboard with charts and date filters ``` ### Create SaaS ``` /toh-vibe Project management tool with teams and tasks ``` --- ## ğŸ¯ Target Users - **Solo Developers** - Build SaaS single-handedly - **Solopreneurs** - Create MVP to test market - **Startup Founders** - Prototype for investors - **Freelancers** - Deliver client work faster - **Students** - Learn modern web development --- ## ğŸ“Š Framework Stats - ğŸ¤– **7 Sub-Agents** - Specialized for different tasks - ğŸ¯ **14 Commands** - From planning to deployment - ğŸ“š **23 Skills** - Comprehensive AI capabilities - ğŸ¨ **13 Design Profiles** - Business-appropriate design - ğŸ“¦ **15 Component Templates** - Ready-to-use premium components - ğŸŒ **5 IDEs** - Claude Code, Cursor, Antigravity, Gemini, Codex --- ## ğŸ¤ Contributing Contributions are welcome!
